title: Fringe-Watching - Madison Cawthorn's Growing Sexual Harassment Scandal | Adam Kinzinger & H.E.R.
itunes:title: Fringe-Watching - Madison Cawthorn's Growing Sexual Harassment Scandal | Adam Kinzinger & H.E.R.
description:
Rep. Madison Cawthorn faces sexual harassment allegations, Rep. Adam Kinzinger discusses the future of the GOP, and singer-songwriter HER talks about her song "Fight for You."

In honor of Women's History Month, support more women running for public office by visiting dailyshow.com/SheShouldRun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
